item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

hmmmmmmmm


package com.rs.game.player.dialogues;


import com.rs.cache.loaders.NPCDefinitions;
import com.rs.game.WorldTile;
import com.rs.game.minigames.CastleWars;
import com.rs.game.player.content.Magic;
import com.rs.utils.ShopsHandler;
import com.rs.game.player.dialogues.OzanD;

public class Veliaf extends Dialogue {
        
        private int npcId;
        
        

        @Override
        public void start() {
                npcId = (Integer) parameters[0];
                sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
                                new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
                                                "Hello devious one. What can I get for you?", }, IS_NPC, npcId, 1569);
        }

        @Override
        public void run(int interfaceId, int componentId) {
                if (stage == -1) {
                        sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
                                        new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), "I'd like to browse Evelestium's armours" }, IS_PLAYER, player.getIndex(), 9827);
                        stage = 1;
                } else if (stage == 1) {
                        sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
                                        "Rare Shop", "Fishing Shop", "Magic Shop", "Archery Shop", "More Options");
                        stage = 2;
                } else if (stage == 2) {
                        if (componentId == 1) {
                                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 1);
                                end();
                        } else if (componentId == 2) {
                                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 3);
                                end();
                        } else if (componentId == 3) {
                                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 10);
                                end(); 
                        } else if (componentId == 4) {
                                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 14);
                                end();
                        } else if (componentId == 5) {
                                stage = 3;
                                sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
                                                "Pk Shop", "Mining Shop", "Herblore Shop", "Farming Shop", "More Options");
                        }
                } else if (stage == 3) {
                        if (componentId == 1) {
                                ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 22);
                                end();
                        } else if (componentId == 2) {
                                ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 23);
                                end();
                        } else if (componentId == 3)
                                ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 24);
                                end();
                        } else if (componentId == 4)
                                ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 25);
                                end();
                         if (componentId == 5) {
                                stage = 4;
                                sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
                                                "Crafting Shop", "Woodcutting Shop", "Skillcape Shop", "Cooking Shop", "More Options");
                        }
                 else if (stage == 4) {
                        if (componentId == 1) {
                                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 26);                        
                                end();
                        } else if (componentId == 2) {
                                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 27);                        
                                end();
                        } else if (componentId == 3) {
                                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 28);                        
                                end();
                        } else if (componentId == 4) {
                                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 29);                        
                                end();
                        } else if (componentId == 5) {
                                stage = 5;
                                sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
                                                "Summoning Shop", "Fishing Shop", "Hunting Shop", "Fancy Shop", "More Options");
                        }
                } else if (stage == 5) {
                        if (componentId == 1) {
                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 30);
                        end();
                } else if (componentId == 2) {
                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 31);
                        end();
                } else if (componentId == 3) {
                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 32);
                        end();
                } else if (componentId == 4) {
                        ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 33);
                        end();
                } else if (componentId == 5) {
                        stage = 6;
                        sendDialogue(SEND_2_OPTIONS, "Now what would you like to do?", 
                                        "I'm done viewing armours, where's the weapons?", "Nevermind");
                        }
                } else if (stage == 6) {
                        if (componentId == 1) {
                                end();
                                Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(3162, 3485, 0));                                
                        } else if (componentId == 2) {
                                end();
                        }
                }
        }
        @Override
        public void finish() {
                
        }
        
        private void teleportPlayer(int x, int y, int z) {
                player.setNextWorldTile(new WorldTile(x, y, z));
                player.stopAll();
        }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Demolitionx711 Demolitionx711
item.description:
@Demolitionx711 wrote:

Thanks now im down to this starting... src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:65: error: illegal start of type } else if (componentId == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:65: error: ';' expected } else if (componentId == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:65: error: illegal start of type } else if (componentId == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:65: error: ';' expected } else if (componentId == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:70: error: illegal start of type else if (stage == 4) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:70: error: ';' expected else if (stage == 4) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:70: error: illegal start of type else if (stage == 4) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:70: error: ';' expected else if (stage == 4) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:88: error: illegal start of type } else if (stage == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:88: error: ';' expected } else if (stage == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:88: error: illegal start of type } else if (stage == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:88: error: ';' expected } else if (stage == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:106: error: illegal start of type } else if (stage == 6) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:106: error: ';' expected } else if (stage == 6) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:106: error: illegal start of type } else if (stage == 6) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:106: error: ';' expected } else if (stage == 6) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:116: error: class, interface, or en um expected public void finish() { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:122: error: class, interface, or en um expected player.stopAll(); ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:123: error: class, interface, or en um expected } ^ 19 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

replace

[code]
package com.rs.game.player.dialogues;

import com.rs.cache.loaders.NPCDefinitions;
import com.rs.game.WorldTile;
import com.rs.game.minigames.CastleWars;
import com.rs.game.player.content.Magic;
import com.rs.utils.ShopsHandler;
import com.rs.game.player.dialogues.OzanD;

public class Veliaf extends Dialogue {

    private int npcId;
    
    

    @Override
    public void start() {
            npcId = (Integer) parameters[0];
            sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
                            new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
                                            "Hello devious one. What can I get for you?", }, IS_NPC, npcId, 1569);
    }

    @Override
    public void run(int interfaceId, int componentId) {
            if (stage == -1) {
                    sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
                                    new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), "I'd like to browse Evelestium's armours" }, IS_PLAYER, player.getIndex(), 9827);
                    stage = 1;
            } else if (stage == 1) {
                    sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
                                    "Rare Shop", "Fishing Shop", "Magic Shop", "Archery Shop", "More Options");
                    stage = 2;
            } else if (stage == 2) {
                    if (componentId == 1) {
                                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 1);
                            end();
                    } else if (componentId == 2) {
                                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 3);
                            end();
                    } else if (componentId == 3) {
                                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 10);
                            end(); 
                    } else if (componentId == 4) {
                                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 14);
                            end();
                    } else if (componentId == 5) {
                            stage = 3;
                            sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
                                            "Pk Shop", "Mining Shop", "Herblore Shop", "Farming Shop", "More Options");
                    }
            } else if (stage == 3) {
                    if (componentId == 1) {
                            ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 22);
                            end();
                    } else if (componentId == 2) {
                            ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 23);
                            end();
                    } else if (componentId == 3)
                            ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 24);
                            end();
                    } else if (componentId == 4)
                            ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 25);
                            end();
                    } else if (componentId == 5) {
                            stage = 4;
                            sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
                                            "Crafting Shop", "Woodcutting Shop", "Skillcape Shop", "Cooking Shop", "More Options");
                    }
             else if (stage == 4) {
                    if (componentId == 1) {
                                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 26);                        
                            end();
                    } else if (componentId == 2) {
                                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 27);                        
                            end();
                    } else if (componentId == 3) {
                                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 28);                        
                            end();
                    } else if (componentId == 4) {
                                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 29);                        
                            end();
                    } else if (componentId == 5) {
                            stage = 5;
                            sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
                                            "Summoning Shop", "Fishing Shop", "Hunting Shop", "Fancy Shop", "More Options");
                    }
            } else if (stage == 5) {
                    if (componentId == 1) {
                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 30);
                    end();
            } else if (componentId == 2) {
                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 31);
                    end();
            } else if (componentId == 3) {
                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 32);
                    end();
            } else if (componentId == 4) {
                    ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 33);
                    end();
            } else if (componentId == 5) {
                    stage = 6;
                    sendDialogue(SEND_2_OPTIONS, "Now what would you like to do?", 
                                    "I'm done viewing armours, where's the weapons?", "Nevermind");
                    }
            } else if (stage == 6) {
                    if (componentId == 1) {
                            end();
                            Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(3162, 3485, 0));                                
                    } else if (componentId == 2) {
                            end();
                    }
            }
    }
    @Override
    public void finish() {
            
    }
    
    private void teleportPlayer(int x, int y, int z) {
            player.setNextWorldTile(new WorldTile(x, y, z));
            player.stopAll();
    }

}
[[/code]

item.title: Error

item.description:
@Demolitionx711 wrote:

starting... src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:65: error: illegal start of type } else if (componentId == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:65: error: ';' expected } else if (componentId == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:65: error: illegal start of type } else if (componentId == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:65: error: ';' expected } else if (componentId == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:70: error: class, interface, or enu m expected } else if (stage == 4) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:73: error: class, interface, or enu m expected end(); ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:101: error: class, interface, or en um expected } else if (componentId == 5) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:103: error: class, interface, or en um expected sendDialogue(SEND_2_OPTIONS, "Now what would you like to do?", ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:105: error: class, interface, or en um expected } ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:109: error: class, interface, or en um expected Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(3162, 3485, 0)); ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Veliaf.java:123: error: class, interface, or en um expected } ^ 31 errors Press any key to continue . . .

This is the first error i’m confused by… any ideas? Here is file below.

[code]package com.rs.game.player.dialogues;

import com.rs.cache.loaders.NPCDefinitions;
import com.rs.game.WorldTile;
import com.rs.game.minigames.CastleWars;
import com.rs.game.player.content.Magic;
import com.rs.utils.ShopsHandler;
import com.rs.game.player.dialogues.OzanD;

public class Veliaf extends Dialogue {

private int npcId;



@Override
public void start() {
	npcId = (Integer) parameters[0];
	sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
			new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
					"Hello devious one. What can I get for you?", }, IS_NPC, npcId, 1569);
}

@Override
public void run(int interfaceId, int componentId) {
	if (stage == -1) {
		sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
				new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), "I'd like to browse Evelestium's armours" }, IS_PLAYER, player.getIndex(), 9827);
		stage = 1;
	} else if (stage == 1) {
		sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
				"Rare Shop", "Fishing Shop", "Magic Shop", "Archery Shop", "More Options");
		stage = 2;
	} else if (stage == 2) {
		if (componentId == 1) {
				ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 1);
			end();
		} else if (componentId == 2) {
				ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 3);
			end();
		} else if (componentId == 3) {
				ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 10);
			end(); 
		} else if (componentId == 4) {
				ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 14);
			end();
		} else if (componentId == 5) {
			stage = 3;
			sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
					"Pk Shop", "Mining Shop", "Herblore Shop", "Farming Shop", "More Options");
		}
	} else if (stage == 3) {
		if (componentId == 1) {
			ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 22);
			end();
		} else if (componentId == 2) {
			ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 23);
			end();
		} else if (componentId == 3)
			ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 24);
			end();
		} else if (componentId == 4)
			ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 25);
			end();
		} else if (componentId == 5) {
			stage = 4;
			sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
					"Crafting Shop", "Woodcutting Shop", "Skillcape Shop", "Cooking Shop", "More Options");
		}
	} else if (stage == 4) {
		if (componentId == 1) {
				ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 26);			
			end();
		} else if (componentId == 2) {
				ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 27);			
			end();
		} else if (componentId == 3) {
				ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 28);			
			end();
		} else if (componentId == 4) {
				ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 29);			
			end();
		} else if (componentId == 5) {
			stage = 5;
			sendDialogue(SEND_5_OPTIONS, "What shop would you like to visit?",
					"Summoning Shop", "Fishing Shop", "Hunting Shop", "Fancy Shop", "More Options");
		}
	} else if (stage == 5) {
		if (componentId == 1) {
		ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 30);
		end();
	} else if (componentId == 2) {
		ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 31);
		end();
	} else if (componentId == 3) {
		ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 32);
		end();
	} else if (componentId == 4) {
		ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 33);
		end();
	} else if (componentId == 5) {
		stage = 6;
		sendDialogue(SEND_2_OPTIONS, "Now what would you like to do?", 
				"I'm done viewing armours, where's the weapons?", "Nevermind");
		}
	} else if (stage == 6) {
		if (componentId == 1) {
			end();
			Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(3162, 3485, 0));				
		} else if (componentId == 2) {
			end();
		}
	}
}
@Override
public void finish() {
	
}

private void teleportPlayer(int x, int y, int z) {
	player.setNextWorldTile(new WorldTile(x, y, z));
	player.stopAll();
}

}[/code]
